oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Southern Serenaders performances - tape 4 - 1950-02-21
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Tape 4 of various performances featuring the Southern Serenaders (performers), as well as Eddy Arnold (performer) and Ernest Tubb (performer) on February 21 , 1950 and an interview with Eddy Arnold on October 1, 1949.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Southern Serenaders; Ernest Tubb; Eddy Arnold
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Test tones -- Weather report ([Unidentified]) -- Farmer Jim Neal talks -- Walking The Floor Over You (Ernest Tubb) -- Farmer Jim Neal introduces Ernest Tubb and the Southern Serenaders -- Ernest tubb talks and introduces the next tune -- I Love You Because (Ernest Tubb, Southern Serenaders) -- Farmer Jim Neal and Ernest Tubb talk and introduce Milton Beasley -- A Lonely Heart Knows (Milton Beasley, Southern Serenaders) (incomplete) -- Farmer Jim Neal and Ernest Tubb talk and introduce the next tune -- You Nearly Lose Your Mind (Ernest Tubb, Southern Serenaders) -- Farmer Jim Neal talks and introduces Eddy Arnold -- Eddy Arnold interview -- Eddy Arnold talks about rumors he hears about his life -- Eddy Arnold talks about his upcoming releases -- Eddy Arnold talks about upcoming shows and concludes the interview
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Southern Serenaders; Tubb, Ernest, 1914-1984; Arnold, Eddy, 1918-2008;
